creditline: Gift of Sandra and Peter Butler
description: two men hunting from a small boat in a marshy landscape; one man standing and shooting at a duck while a dog is leaping from the boat after the duck; rows of green grasses and trees, yellow grasses and trees with red foliage; blue sky with clouds; white crane, LLC; white and yellow flowers; primitive style
marks: Signature and Label LLC, in black: [L. VIVIN]
title: La Chasse aux Canards
